entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6 except minus 2 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6 except minus 2 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:43 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 8 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 8 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 08:43 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
